responses: The library is at 5th floor on Block A. Please contact there in case of any query.

responses: Yes , you Can avail the bus facility in around 30000/- RS per annum. To get details Information you can Contact on 074230-XXXXX  OR you can use public transport facility like Local bus / city bus or ibus

computer code is a unique computer code given to every student to access specified portal for college releted stuff , CMS is the website for students where they login with unique computer code to enjoy a specific interface where they have access to see results , receipts and many more information . In case you have forgotton your computer code or password , immediately contact your coordinator

patterns: how exams are conducted in IPS Academy
what is the exam patterns of IPS
how many exams are there in IPS in a Particular semester
responses: In a semester , there are 2 MSTs of 20 marks in each subject followed by a main exams of 70 marks of theroy and 30 marks for exrernal where 33% of total is required to clear the examination

responses: By using our telegram bot , you can easily get syllabus of any year/semester/department just by clicking scheme and syllbus button or visit college website
